summary: A visual combat wound system; immersive, persistent, gruesome; drawing upon the overlay plugin capabilities of RaceMenu.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/0Hh1nLC.jpg[/IMG]

"War has always been the grand sagacity of every spirit

which has grown too inward and too profound;

its curative power lies even in the wounds one receives."

-Nietzsche

Your character can now receive visual wounds on their body. These wounds are weapon specific, so if you're sliced with a dagger, expect many minor cuts. If you're hacked with an axe, you can expect your character to sport rather large gashes.

The armor you are wearing is also a factor. If you're wearing heavy armor and get hit with a warhammer, you can certainly expect a few bruises and broken ribs.
author: Metaseverity
